name: Agile AI Workflow MCP Server
description: MCP server for agile AI workflow, supporting Agile Coach, BA, TL, DEV, QA roles as MCP tools.

tools.name: coach
tools.description: Agile Coach: 在MCP工具链调用前，分析user story和上下文，给出流程建议、顺序、输出标准和校验，发现问题时要求对应输出者重写。

tools.name: ba
tools.description: Business Analyst: 读取产品目标，生成 user stories（YAML）

tools.name: tl
tools.description: Tech Lead: 读取 user stories，拆分技术任务（YAML）

tools.name: qa
tools.description: Tester: 读取 user stories，生成测试用例（YAML）
